name: FortressEscape
description:
Play a tower defense game, then try to escape your own fortress while finding your way through the maze!

For better graphics and mouse sensitivity, try the desktop build.

TIPS TD : Drag to build a turret. FPS : Shoot the weak spots of the turrets.

I really wish we could have improved the FPS gameplay and added more sounds during the jam, but hey! It's still a game ;-)

Also make sure to try my LD41 entry !
